Uses of Interface
it.apice.sapere.api.space.LSAspace

Packages that use LSAspace
it.apice.sapere.api.nodes This package contains the definition of SAPERE nodes and agents. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space This package contains LSA-space interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.nodes.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API (.nodes). 
it.apice.sapere.space.impl This package contains the implementation of the services required to handle an LSA-space (.space). 
 

Uses of LSAspace in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes
 

Methods in it.apice.sapere.api.nodes that return LSAspace
 LSAspace SAPERENode.getLocalLSASpace()
           Retrieves a reference to the (local) LSA-space.

           Specifies the behaviour of the agent.
 

Uses of LSAspace in it.apice.sapere.api.space
 

Subinterfaces of LSAspace in it.apice.sapere.api.space
 interface ExtLSAspace
           This interface models an LSA-space (local), providing each feature declared in LSAspace, plus some special methods useful for background handling.

           Should return a valid LSAspace.

           Removes the LSA from the space.
 LSAspace LSAspace.remove(LSA lsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Removes the LSA from the space.
 LSAspace ExtLSAspace.update(LSA lsa)
           Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.
 LSAspace LSAspace.update(LSA lsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.
